thread.title: Fire in shopping mall in Siberia kills five and injures 32

title: Fire in shopping mall in Siberia kills five and injures 32
text: March 25, 2018 / 3:23 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago Shopping mall blaze in Siberia kills 37: Russian agencies Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MOSCOW (Reuters) - At least 37 people died in a fire in a shopping mall in the Siberian city of Kemerovo on Sunday, Russian news agencies reported, citing authorities. Firefighters extinguish a fire at a shopping mall in Kemerovo, Russia March 25, 2018. REUTERS/Dmitry Saturin News agencies said more than 100 people had been evacuated from the mall, which contains cinemas, restaurants and shops. Rescue personnel is seen on a site of fire at a shopping mall in Kemerovo, Russia March 25, 2018. REUTERS/Dmitry Saturin There was no immediate indication of the cause of the fire. Television pictures showed people jumping from the windows of the mall, which was engulfed in black smoke. Kemerovo is a coal-producing region some 3,600 km (2,200 miles) east of Moscow. (Fixes ungrammatical headline)
